/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, divided by a median, is flanked by lush green trees on both sides, creating a natural canopy over the urban landscape. 

Vehicles, including a white truck and a black car, are seen traversing the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image beautifully encapsulates the blend of nature and urban life in Beijing.
